In childhood I was a calm and trouble-free child and mostly played alone with myself
In adolescence I was indifferent to subjects like love, competition and attracting attention, and generally was away from currents and neutral and on the sidelines
In family and work environment I'm known as a confidant and am not fault-finding and complaining
Despite events and turmoil of the outer world, within myself I have deep inner peace and others also get peace from me
I'm very calm and quiet and from this calm and silence I feel great security with myself
Though my way of being is influential, I prefer to remain behind matters and not be prominent, so that in gatherings I'm usually invisible
I feel peace and comfort from being at home and usually don't get bored from being at home
For advancement in work I'm not competitive or ambitious
Gaining position, wealth and power is not my life priority

I trust the flow of life as it goes, so that there's always deep and conscious acceptance in me toward conditions and events around, and I think definitely every event that happens is good and I don't complain, and this makes me satisfied with my type of life and its process at any age
I'm inclined to religion, mysticism, spirituality and spiritual gatherings
At parties I dress in a way that my feminine (sexual) characteristics remain hidden and I don't attract attention with my body, clothes and behavior and am simply dressed
When doing daily housework like dusting, washing, ironing, cooking... I get absorbed in them and doing them is sacred to me, not a duty, and causes peace and satisfaction of my heart
I feel if support is cut from me and I need to enter social life, I might not be able to handle social work
Being a listener is one of my prominent characteristics and I can listen to others' words with patience and without judgment, and many tell me their heart's words
I'm happy when I have times for worship and solitude and meditation (especially those where silence is observed) and am completely absorbed in it
My life motto is: There's no hurry in work and life can be moved forward calmly and with spirituality
I prefer to host my guests in my own house and be busy cooking in the kitchen
I generally feel lonely and alone, even when I'm with people I love, and I enjoy solitude

I generally don't have the ability to express emotions and affection to loved ones through words and physical contact, while my inner feelings are much deeper than what I show, and my way of attention is indirect and through doing kind acts
My circle of relationships is not very wide and I have few friends
If my spouse has long trips and is away from me, I'm comfortable in solitude and don't feel hurt
If my spouse betrays me, I'm not deeply wounded
I leave my children free in their choices to find their way and don't impose a specific choice on them and don't force guide them in a specific direction
To me in this world nothing is worth being upsetting and disturbing my peace or making me upset or occupying my mind because of it
